Game Settings can be found by pressing your device\'s Menu Button and by clicking the overfolow button on BlackBerry devices.
Overflow ButtonThis will become avaliable all the time with BlackBerry OS update to 10.2 but on 10.1, you must swipe DOWN from the top bezel and click the three vertical dots.
BackThis will become avaliable all the time with BlackBerry OS update to 10.2 but on 10.1, you must swipe diagonally from right to left on the BOTTOM bezel, making a back gesture.

________________

Tips

Make sure you put on your accessories at the start of the game by clicking your player icon in the bottom corner.

You can change settings through the preferences button

To rest, walk to an avaliable bed

Make sure you make a savefile of your game and save through that from time to time. Note, the game DOES quicksave

________________

Interface Icons

The Chest

Quickslots [Long press the pouches inside to assign items for instant use]

The Hero

Menu [Overview, Quests, Skills & Inventory *]

* (While in inventory, "press" an item for information & "long press" for more options)

The Enemy

Information [Appears during Combat]
